flixel.system.input.mouse.FlxMouseButton

type
class
A helper class for mouse input

Static Variables

FAST_PRESS_RELEASE(inline,null) : Int

JUST_PRESSED(inline,null) : Int

JUST_RELEASED(inline,null) : Int

PRESSED(inline,null) : Int

RELEASED(inline,null) : Int

Constructor

new(?IsLeftMouse : Bool)

Instance Variables

current : Int

The current state of this mouse button.

last : Int

The last state of this mouse button.

Instance Methods

inline justPressed() : Bool

returns
Whether the button was just pressed.
Check to see if the button was just pressed.

inline justReleased() : Bool

returns
Whether the button was just released.
Check to see if the button was just released.

onDown(FlashEvent : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
FlashEvent Flash mouse event.
Internal event handler for input and focus.

onUp(?FlashEvent : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
FlashEvent Flash mouse event.
Internal event handler for input and focus.

inline pressed() : Bool

returns
Whether the button is pressed.
Check to see if the button is pressed.

inline reset() : Void

Resets the just pressed/just released flags and sets mouse to not pressed.

update() : Void

Upates the last and current state of this mouse button.
